title: 04/08/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 04/08/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
Colin doesn't understand the urge to Draft Mac Jones after seeing his present abilities. Washington needs to step on the gas and trade up to number 4 with Atlanta to draft a quarterback. Patriots have shown us all they're irrelevant without Tom Brady. Plus, Bucky Brooks joins Colin for a first round NFL Mock Draft!


Guest: Bucky Brooks

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
